channel.title: Play The Field
channel.description: Play The Field is three college buddies talking about everything you need to know regarding the major sports organizations in the world and top collegiate athletics. Top headlines and topics will be discussed and debates are encouraged. It might even get a little heated, tune in!
channel.itunes:author: High Tops Media & Tyler Purdy, Max Adams, and Liam Spellman

item.title: Winners of the NFL Draft and it’s the Ja Show
item.description:
This week on Play The Field, Liam, Max, and Tyler talk about the winners and losers of the 2022 NFL Draft. They also discuss the current series in the NBA playoffs and give their bets for the week.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/playthefieldpod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: NFL Mock Draft + Get the Brooms Out Boston!
item.description:
This week on Play The Field, Liam, Max, and Tyler talk about round one of the NBA playoffs and how the series are unfolding. They also give a top 10 mock draft for the NFL Draft this Thursday.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.title: NBA Season Recap + Play-in Game Locks
item.description:

item.title: Introducing Play The Field
item.description:
Play The Field, hosted by Tyler Purdy, Max Adams, & Liam Spellman, is three college buddies talking about everything you need to know regarding the major sports organizations in the world and top collegiate athletics. Top headlines and topics will be discussed and debates are encouraged. It might even get a little heated! Be sure to tune in on Wednesdays, you won’t want to miss it!

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/playthefieldpod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
